text:
League 1
OL: Fekir, not against a return!
Real Betis player Nabil F√©kir spoke about his start to the season in these new colors and different subjects.
03 Nov 2019, 12:20 by Hugo Deloraine



Nabil F√©kir has a smile! Happy at Real Betis despite a mixed start to the season, the former Lyon spoke on various topics at the microphone of Telefoot. He explains that "in terms of results" Betis is not "expectations and expectations" but "the season is still long". Nabil F√©kir "understands that his choice could" surprise "because according to him" when you leave a club like Lyon who plays every year the European Cup, it's a bit incomprehensible to go to a club in the middle of classification " but he likes "to take up challenges, even if they can appear crazy"







Aborted transfer to Liverpool




Fekir vs Real + 21 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

"It's not because of my entourage if the transfer to Liverpool has not been done," explains the French international. Lyon is the "heart club" of F√©kir. While greeting "the greatest president of France" Jean Michel Aulas, the old Lyonnais confessed "that a return to the Ol was possible and that it was in a corner of his head" But not for the moment. "Why not later tell it!" Finally, he confirmed that "the Euro was a goal!"
